content.en: Optimal regression algorithms: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms for optimal design in regression models. These algorithms, such as numerical solution algorithms and iterative algorithms, are used to improve convergence behavior and generate marginally restricted linear-optimal designs. Additionally, algorithms based on multiple optimality criteria are combined to generate model-robust designs. These findings contribute to the development of more efficient and accurate regression models.
content.da: Optimale regressionsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til optimal design i regressionsmodeller. Disse algoritmer, såsom numeriske løsningsalgoritmer og iterative algoritmer, bruges til at forbedre konvergensadfærd og generere marginalt begrænsede lineært optimale designs. Derudover kombineres algoritmer baseret på flere optimalitetskriterier for at generere modelrobuste designs. Disse resultater bidrager til udviklingen af mere effektive og præcise regressionsmodeller.
